Blog.post: I'm here at a baby shower and it has been 4.5 hours since I got here. (A little too long for my liking.) It was fun at 1st, but now it's boring. I wish I drove myself so I could go home now :( :( Please don't do annonymous posts.

I really get Now 15 , not Now 5. (And I was just starting to get pumped about Now 5...) 01 Toxic | Britney Spears 02 Me Myself And I | Beyonce 03 With You | Jessica Simpson 04 Hold On | Good Charlotte 05 Stand Up | Ludacris 06 Read Your Mind | Avant 07 Holidae In | Chingy 08 Gangsta Nation | Westside Connection 09 It's My Life | No Doubt 10 The First Cut Is The Deepest | Sheryl Crow 11 Feelin' It | Blink 182 12 Change Clothes | Jay-Z 13 Away From The Sun | 3 Doors Down 14 Step In The Name Of Love | R Kelly 15 I Don't Want You Back | Eamon 16 Gigolo | Nick Cannon 17 100 Years | Five For Fighting 18 This I Swear | Nick Lachey 19 I Hate Everything | Three Days Grace 20 Sunrise | Norah Jones

I love chocolate chip bagels with peanut butter. Plus: DAD bought POPTARTS! By the way... I just found out with some CDs I ordered I get NOW 5 Free! haha Look @ the tracks: 1: It's Gonna Be Me - N Sync --2: Give Me Just One Night (Una Noche) - 98 Degrees --3: Jumpin', Jumpin' - Destiny's Child --4: Don't Think I'm Not - Kandi --5: I Think I'm In Love With You - Jessica Simpson --6: Faded - Souldecision --7: Shake It Fast - Mystikal --8: Case Of The Ex - Mya --9: Aaron's Party (Come & Get It) - Aaron Carter --10: Lucky - Britney Spears --11: Show Me The Meaning Of Being Lonely - Backstreet Boys --12: Incomplete - Sisqo --13: I Wanna Be With You - Mandy Moore --14: Doesn't Really Matter - Janet Jackson --15: Back Here - BBMak --16: Absolutely (Story Of A Girl) - Nine Days --17: Kryptonite - 3 Doors Down --18: Wonderful - Everclear --19: It's My Life - Bon Jovi
I made Steffi watch the movie with me. I don't care what anyone says. Orlando Bloom is way, way, way hotter than Johnny Depp. You best start believing in ghost stories Miss Turner. You're in one.
I went to Northville Swim Club with Steffi's rhythmic friends. Fun stuff. Today was a productive day!

Ok...showed up for debate club, NO ONE was there. I'm pretty sure I'm going to quit unless things change soon. But while I was at the library, I checked out the trashiest romance novels I could find, so hopefully I'll have fun with that!

urlLink What Finding Nemo Character are You? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla You're a Speak & Spell!! You nerd, you. Just because you were disguised as a toy doesn't mean you weren't educational, you sneaky bastard. urlLink What childhood toy from the 80s are you? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Power Rangers Movie! urlLink What movie Do you Belong in?(many different outcomes!) brought to you by urlLink Quizilla
I love my tennis friends !! We're starting our own matchplay - we split the cost of a pizza - we play on free courts - and we bring our own prizes to raffle off Not having to pay $30: PRICELESS!

I thought I would have fun doing this, but no. It's just making mre more bored. What do you do when your bored? I usually watch tv, but I spent 2 hours watching pure Jessica Simpson last night, and though at the time it was fun, I really regret it now. I just am not the type of person that deals with being bored easily. I guess I could do the SAT and ACT books my parents bought me... actually, no, I don't want to. I could also read, but that doesn't seem like doing anything to me! And I can't go to the pool becuase of this gay weather! >:(

My favorite song at the moment is "Accidentally in Love" by Counting Crows. It's in Shrek 2. I bought the Shrek 2 CD yesterday... fun stuff! Come on, come on Turn a little faster Come on, come on The world will follow after Come on, come on Cause everybody's after love
I'm all dresssed cute, but I have nowhere to go :(

I haven't posted in awhile. I guess I just do it when I'm bored or angry. This is an angry moment. I suck at tennis. Today I played so bad :( I was playing really good the whole week until today. I don't wanna get demoted. So, I'm stressed about that. I need to go hit groundstrokes with someone. Yesterday was a really good day though. I went to a fun party. I have to look at the good things in life. I mean tennis was kind of fun today, because we had our annual Mother's Pizza thing. And Caitlin gave me a souviner (can't spell). That was cool.
